sailpoint.object

Interface RequestExecutor


  • public interface RequestExecutor
    An interface that must be implemented by any class to be managed by the request processor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(SailPointContext context, Request request, Attributes<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> args)
      Execute the request.
      boolean terminate()
      Requests that the job be terminated.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(SailPointContext context,
           Request request,
           Attributes<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> args)
             throws sailpoint.request.RequestPermanentException,
                    sailpoint.request.RequestTemporaryException
        Execute the request. The argument map contains the arguments from the RequestDefinition merged with those from the Request.

        The executor may leave things in the Request, it will be automatically saved when the executor returns.

        Any exception thrown by the task will be caught and added to the Request automatically.

        Throws:
        sailpoint.request.RequestPermanentException
        sailpoint.request.RequestTemporaryException

      • terminate

        boolean terminate()
        Requests that the job be terminated. Not guaranteed to succeed. Returns true if the terminate might be handled, false if it will definitely not be handled.
